title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Characters for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Brush and brown watercolor on white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on image, lower right:  5
dimensions: 45.6 x 38.1 cm (18 1/16 x 15 1/16 in. ), irregular sheet
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Portion of Hebrew inscription, including partial image of two hands at left and an etrog (citron) at right.  Large margin at right to place next section of inscription to right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Characters for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69.
1968–69. Brush and brown watercolor on white wove paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-78-e.
